name: Ludum Dare 40 (Beege)
description:
Game I created for Ludum Dare 40.

The objective is to catch the presents and send them down the correct shoot. The more presents that you hold, the more difficult the game becomes. Carry too many and it's game over. Destroy five and it's also game over.

Enjoy!

Controls:

Move - [A], [D] or [Left arrow], [Right arrow] or [Left analog] on Xbox controller
Deposit present [Space] or (A) on Xbox controller
